title: Treetop Village
text: Treetop Village enters the battlefield tapped.: Add  to your mana pool.: Treetop Village becomes a 3/3 green Ape creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. (If it would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
expansion: Duel Decks Anthology, Garruk vs. Liliana
